description: Generates a future relationship prediction based on names and compatibility data, covering emotional trajectory, potential challenges, and long-term outlook.

example_response.short_term_prediction: Prediction for the next few months
example_response.emotional_trajectory: One of: Rising, Steady, Transformative, Deepening
